column2: Wash and peel the cucumber, then thinly slice it.'
In a bowl, combine sliced cucumber, Greek yogurt, chopped fresh dill, lemon juice, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.'
'Toss gently until the cucumber slices are well coated with the creamy dressing.'
'Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow the flavors to meld.'
